verses.roman:
vivāha karile haila navīna yauvana
sarvatra laoyāila prabhu nāma-saṅkīrtana

synonyms: vivāha karile—after getting married; haila—began; navīna—new; yauvana—youth; sarvatra—everywhere; laoyāila—caused to take; prabhu—the Lord; nāma-saṅkīrtana—the saṅkīrtana movement.
translation: After His marriage His youth began, and in His youth He induced everyone to chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra anywhere and everywhere.
